user.title: Welcome to Green Shift
user.description: Welcome to the Green Shift energy research project! This integration helps you monitor and optimize your home's energy efficiency. Click next to begin setup.

settings.title: Energy Configuration
settings.description: Please provide your local currency and current electricity cost per kWh to calculate savings.

intervention_info.title: Phase 1: Baseline Observation
intervention_info.description:
For the first 14 days, the system will only collect and display energy consumption data to establish a baseline. 

After this period, **Gamification Challenges** and **AI-driven notifications** will be automatically activated to help improve your performance.
